description:
Serena Cadenzavna Eve is Maria`s younger sister with unparalleled talent. A girl with a kind personality, she has learned not to use her Gear in battle, although she has already fused with the Symphogear. Her gentle voice heals Maria`s heart, and Serena`s smile is the single foundation that supports her elder sister`s determination.
Source: ANN
name: Serena Cadenzavna Eve
